page.title: 15A short history of Clacton
page.content:
The seaside resort of{Clacton}did not exist until about a hundred years ago, when the pier was built and people travelled by cart down to the beach from{Gt. Clacton.
Today the old church of St.John is still standing after a thousand years. Before the church stood there were open fields and maybe a bit of woodland and some winding rutted lanes and driftways. There were probably havens across the coast that have maybe disappeared beneath the waves.
Building needs were landed on the shore from barges within living memory and earlier it was coal and chalk to fertilise the fields.
